name: Giraffe Steps
description:
Climb though a long tree and eat Apples!

Giraffe Steps is a game where you control Molly, a 3 month old baby giraffe who can make her neck grow to an abnormal height for her age. Molly's hungry, and because of that, she starts climbing a long tree in search of food!

This game was made by Water Melon, for "Tu juego a juicio Jam", a Jam made by Alva Majo
